definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Three minifigures are included: one male and one female astronaut as well as a service crew member.
sentences.chinese: 整套模型還有一男一女兩名航天員及一個地勤人員。

sentences.english: He routinely radioed another agent on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他跟另一個地勤人員進行了例行的無限電聯絡。

sentences.english: The airport ground crew tried to dissuade the pilot from taking off.
sentences.chinese: 機場地勤人員試圖阻止這位飛行員駕機起飛。

sentences.english: The pilot routinely radioed another agent on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 飛行員跟另一個地勤人員進行了例行的無線電聯絡。

sentences.english: Pilots and ground crew shake hands after another successful show.
sentences.chinese: 飛行員和地勤人員在又一次成功表演後握手。

sentences.english: These were mostly a mix of raw conscripts and drafted Luftwaffe ground personnel.
sentences.chinese: 這些人大多是新招募的或者是空軍的地勤人員。
